short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify web design with our Chrome extension: Color Palette & Gradient Generator for effortless color schemes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your web design workflow with our Color Palette & Gradient Generator Chrome extension. Create stunning color schemes and gradients for your websites effortlessly. Whether you're a professional web developer or a design enthusiast, our tool simplifies the process of selecting and implementing beautiful color combinations.
